Uses of Package
wlv.mt.features.util

Packages that use wlv.mt.features.util
wlv.mt.aren Package containing classes specific to the Arabic-to-English translation project 
wlv.mt.features.impl   
wlv.mt.features.impl.bb This package contains implementations of Blackbox features. 
wlv.mt.features.impl.gb This package contains implementations of Glassbox features 
wlv.mt.features.util   
wlv.mt.tools This package contains wrappers for various pre-processing tools and Processor classes for interpreting the output of the tools 
wlv.mt.tools.stf This package contains classes that provide access to the stanford parser output 
wlv.mt.xmlwrap This package contains XML wrappers around the output of the IBM and CMU systems 
 

Classes in wlv.mt.features.util used by wlv.mt.aren
FeatureManager
          The FeatureManager controls the loading, instantiation and running of the features.
 

Classes in wlv.mt.features.util used by wlv.mt.features.impl
Sentence
          Models a sentence as a span of text containing multiple information added by pre-processing tools
It provides direct access to well used features of a sentence, such as its text, tokens, ngrams, phrases, but also allows any tool to add information related to the sentence via the setValue() method.
 

Classes in wlv.mt.features.util used by wlv.mt.features.impl.bb
Sentence
          Models a sentence as a span of text containing multiple information added by pre-processing tools
It provides direct access to well used features of a sentence, such as its text, tokens, ngrams, phrases, but also allows any tool to add information related to the sentence via the setValue() method.

Classes in wlv.mt.features.util used by wlv.mt.features.util
FeatureArgumentException
           
FeatureLoader
          A FeatureLoader is responisble for instantiating Feature objects from a list of feature indeces
Phrase
          Models a translation phrase as a span of text starting and ending at given positions in the input

SentenceTranslationModel
           
Translation
          This class encapsulates information about translations in an n-best list
